name: The Path to Yggdrasil Demo
description: The Path to Yggdrasil is a puzzle-based exploration game based on Nordic myths and runes. It is a third person game where the player will traverse the ancient ruined city of Yggheim to uncover the various secrets hidden there and complete the final goal of reaching Yggdrasil, the world tree that connects the mortal world with the world of the gods. Players will collect different runestones that when used together in different combinations create a variety of magical effects that are used to complete the puzzles within the game.
